name: seenema
description: Seenema is a movie/tv show browsing website that allows users to browse movies, add movies to watchlist, and send movie recommendations to friends.

scripts.start: npm run start-frontend && npm run start-backend
scripts.install: npm run install-frontend && npm run install-backend
scripts.test: npm run test-frontend && npm run test-backend

author: Leena Kapadiya
